title: Kristin Just Told Bert WHAT Off-Air?!
description:
If you missed it earlier, we talked about being a part of the Atlanta pride parade this weekend. We're thrilled, and Kristin has taken charge of everything including getting our shirts. But there is something she just told Bert off-air that shocked him. Looks like Kristin has some explaining to do.

itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
